items.text:
Lunn eagerly unfurls a canvas roll, revealing his collection of found
objects. “See anything you like?” Lunn asks. “I’m happy to trade
for anything you have. If it wasn’t for you, I might still be lost in the
woods!”

Each Ranger may search their Ranger deck for a gear and add it to
their hand. Then each Ranger may return a gear from their hand to the
collection. If they did, then they choose a starting gear card from the
collection that they meet the aspect requirement for and add it to their
hand. (This alteration to their deck is permanent.)

Lunn happily trades with you. When you’re finished, he wraps up the
canvas and heads out into the woods, whistling his usual aimless tune.
